items.summary: Update user-facing copy to explicitly clarify that a requested "Web control" / "World Wide Web Controller" role is not supported by this application, and guide the user toward the supported roles (App Controller, Security, ICP Controller) that can actually be granted.

Update the Access Denied screen copy for authenticated-but-unauthorized users to include an explicit note that "Web control" access cannot be granted because it is not a supported role in this app, and point users to requesting Security or ICP Controller access instead.
